show.description: Whether or not to display animations

vertical.description: Whether the icon and text are arranged vertically
vertical.description_zh: 图标和文字是否垂直排列

size.description: The size of the loading icon, in px

textSize.description: The size of the loaded text, in px

timingFunction.description: Specify the css attribute of animation-timing-function, but only if the mode is set to circle or semicircle
timingFunction.description_zh: 指定animation-timing-function的css属性，但只支持mode为circle或semicircle才有效

duration.description: Animation execution cycle time, in ms
duration.description_zh: 动画执行周期时间，单位ms

inactiveColor.description: The dark edge color of the icon, mode is valid for circle mode
inactiveColor.description_zh: 图标的暗边颜色, mode为circle 模式有效
